name: Event Planner Notion Template
description: Download for free by putting 0 in the price box, or tip an amount of your choice.Use this powerful template to plan any event in a short amount of time! Share the template with others to collaborate or do it alone. This template ensures that you don't forget anything, even if you're in a rush. Follow a timeline, tick off tasks as you go, and stay within budget!There are two versions of the template: one is a database and on the other one, you can see everything on one page.Click 'Duplicate' in t
